title: Princess CruisesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Princess Cruises Sun Drenched Deals sale offers special savings
Princess Cruises Sun Drenched Deals sale offers special savings to sunny cruise destinations for 2016. Guests will save up to $1,000 per stateroom on more than 130 warm weather cruises to the Caribbean, Mexican Riviera, California Coast and the Hawaiian Islands. Plus, they receive free onboard spending money of up to $300 per stateroom.
Those who book a balcony, mini-suite or suite will receive a $150 onboard credit per stateroom for six- to seven- day cruises or $300 per stateroom for cruises 10 days or longer. Guests who book an interior or oceanview stateroom will receive $50 onboard credit per stateroom on six- to seven- day cruises or $100 per stateroom for cruises 10 days or longer.
In addition, guests can book this special cruise deal with a deposit of only $100 per person.
Examples of Sun-Drenched cruise deals include:
Caribbean cruise vacations — 7 days: $499 interior; $699 balcony
Mexican Riviera cruise vacations — 7 days: $499 interior; $749 balcony
California Coastal cruise vacations — 7 days: $599 interior; $849 balcony
Mexican Riviera cruise vacations — 10 days: $699 interior; $1,099 balcony
Hawaiian Islands cruise vacations — 15 days: $1,599 interior; $2,499 balcony
All cruise prices are per person, based on double occupancy. The “Sun-Drenched Deals” sale runs through 11:59 p.m. PST on November 17, 2015 and is available to residents of the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, Mexico and Bermuda.
About Princess Cruises:
One of the best-known names in cruising, Princess Cruises is a global cruise line and tour company operating a fleet of 18 modern cruise ships renowned for their innovative design and wide array of choices in dining, entertainment and amenities, all provided with the experience of exceptional customer service. A recognized leader in worldwide cruising, Princess carries 1.7 million guests each year to more than 360 destinations around the globe on more than 150 itineraries ranging in length from three to 114 days.
